'''Fortune's Favor''' is [[Bennett]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Bennett wears cuffed navy shorts and a sleeveless cream-colored jacket with blue and gold details, a leather belt, a bag with his {{Pyro}} [[Vision]] attached to it, gloves, a yellow bandanna tied around his right arm, and goggles on his head.
